value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Workers and Economy (Basic Guide & Tutorial)
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void - All races workers work the same (mule notwithstanding!)  Wiki on mining: http://wiki.teamliquid.net/starcraft2/Mining_Minerals

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Zerg Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017)
value.excerpt: We go over the basic mechanics of zerg and show the importance of understanding at least some of what your opponent is doing.  This guide is meant for players with an understanding of the objectives of starcraft but without any strong direction or gameplan, especially for each specific race! -- Watch
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UdFTRsXMG7w" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft: Zerg Starter Guide #2 [BUILD ORDER] (Updated 2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: We go over a very basic Zerg build order designed to get you into the midgame with a good economy and options. These guides are in no particular order, nor are they meant for COMPLETELY NEW (less than 10 games) players, instead are all meant to help improve generally!

value.title: Pig Coaches Winter! Learning Starcraft (Pro Coaches Grandmaster)
value.excerpt: Pig is a former professional player who now streams regularly and is one of the top 50 Grandmaster players on NA as random, and is still one of the best zergs in the world. Check him out:  https://www.youtube.com/user/PiGstarcraft https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig https://twitter.com/x5_PiG

value.title: Starcraft 2: Beginner Guides - Multiplayer Gameplay Settings Guide and Recommendations (Updated)
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void. An updated version of the gameplay/controls and region settings guide for Legacy of the Void, going over the changes and reiterating my recommended settings, as well as the settings I use as a Grandmaster player.  Thanks for watching and hope you enjoy!  I am a Grandmasters

value.title: Starcraft 2: Updated 2018 - Basic Hotkeys, Control Groups and Production Tutorial
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void.  I break down what I use hotkeys and control groups for, hopefully you find this video helpful!
